description:
* Based on a love comedy manga by http://anidb.net/cr80434 [Azuma Fuyu].
http://anidb.net/ch147194 [Kashiwada] and http://anidb.net/ch147193 [Oota] are classmates at a junior high school. Oota is always thinking of pranks to surprise Kashiwada, but he always fails. Kashiwada likes to look at Oota, for he shows his emotions on his face too much. They look like opposite type of people, but they both care about each other.
"Look, Oota is up to something..." Other classmates love to see the unique relationship between them.
Source: BookWalker
Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event on 3 July 2025 at Anime Expo 2025 in Los Angeles, United States. The regular TV broadcast started on 4 October 2025.

REGULAR.description:
Kashiwada is inexpressive and Oota is very expressive.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Mattaku Kao ni Denai Hito to Mechakucha Kao ni Deru Hito / Kashiwada-san no Ichinichi
Those Who Are Completely Inexpressive and Those Who Are Super Expressive
全く顔に出ない人とめちゃくちゃ顔に出る人 / 柏田さんの一日

REGULAR.description:
Oota hopes that the extra tools around the pool will give him the means to shock Kashiwada.
Source: Crunchyroll

Getting trapped in the gym storage room might give Oota the chance to get a rise out of Kashiwada.
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Oota invites Kashiwada to a horror movie hoping to see her freak out. Is it a date?
Source: Crunchyroll

Oota tempts fate when his sister becomes aware of his situation with Kashiwada.

REGULAR.description:
Tadokoro ends up in the middle of a three-way standoff between Oota, Tabuchi, and Kashiwada.
Source: Crunchyroll

Oota has devised a perfect plan to scare Kashiwada: invite her to his house while the two of them are alone.
Source: Crunchyroll

Kashiwada, Oota, and their friends head to the beach, with Oota`s sister tagging along to cause trouble.
